articles.title: "Will Tell You What Is Free Revdi": Arvind Kejriwal Returns PM's Jab
articles.description: In a pointed attack seemingly directed at PM Modi, Arvind Kejriwal said, "When you forgive thousands of crores in loans for your friends, that is free revdi. When you go for foreign trips, and seek contracts for your friends, that is free revdi."
articles.content:
Arvind Kejriwal said a state spending money on its people was not "revdi".
New Delhi: Free water, electricity, healthcare or world-class primary education are not "revdis" but the responsibility of … [+3007 chars]

articles.title: "Revdi Culture": PM's Electoral Freebie Warning At UP Expressway Launch
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday cautioned people against what he called a "revdi (sweet) culture" under which votes were sought by promising freebies and said this could be "very dangerous" for development of the country.
articles.content:
The "revdi culture" could be "very dangerous" for the country's development, PM Modi said.

articles.title: Sonia Gandhi Behind Plot To Frame Narendra Modi In Gujarat Riots, Says BJP
articles.description: The BJP on Saturday alleged that Congress president Sonia Gandhi was the "driving force" behind the "conspiracy" to implicate then Gujarat chief minister Narendra Modi in the 2002 riots case in the state.
articles.content:
Sonia Gandhi should address a press conference on this, demanded the BJP leader. (FILE)

articles.description: Telangana Chief Minister K Chandrashekar Rao is trying to coordinate like-minded parties to launch a united attack against the centre's alleged anti-people policies, NDTV has learnt.
